ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.label: transparent roof
ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.description: Transparent roof that allows light to pass through. Virtually no effect on the weather inside the room.

ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.label: Stone roof
ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.description: A dense stone roof capable of withstanding multiple hits from non-serious ammunition.

ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.label: Metal roof
ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.description: Solid metal roof. It has moderate durability and well protects against a variety of ammunition.

ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.label: Reinforced concrete roof
ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.description: A very dense roof made of concrete and metal, able to withstand powerful projectiles.

ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.label: Greenhouse roof
ProjectParagon.Core.Things.ExtendedRoofD.description: A transparent roof of a certain thickness that protects the plants from direct sunlight and bad weather and allows you to save more heat.
